TextView.android:text:
GOOGLE learn to earn :-
 I successfully completed Google Learn to Earn, a 3-week program, achieving all weekly labs and earning rewards from Google Qwiklabs . duration=Jan 2022 - Feb 2022

 Microsoft Fossile :-
 Active participation in Microsoft FOSSIL event, completing a 4-week program and receiving eTree Digital SWAG, and now a proud owner of a tree in the Azure Developer Community Forest .
